data.title: The Ministry of Truth: The Biography of George Orwell's 1984 by Lynskey, Dorian: As New Hardcover (2019) 1st Edition
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780385544054 - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Doubleday, New York - 2019 - Condition: As New - As New - As New condition Hardcover rust boards with black spine and copper lettering. Includes several b/w photographs with Appendix, Notes and Index, 355 pages. The DJ is in As New condition. The exception to the condition is a remainder mark on the bottom of the text block. - The Ministry of Truth: The Biography of George Orwell's 1984
data.text:
About this Item

As New condition Hardcover rust boards with black spine and copper lettering. Includes several b/w photographs with Appendix, Notes and Index, 355 pages. The DJ is in As New condition. The exception to the condition is a remainder mark on the bottom of the text block. Seller Inventory # 001472

Contact seller

Report this item

BookEnds Bookstore is housed in an enchanting old church which has been reimagined into a brick and mortar bookstore located in the quaint town of Ojai,California USA. We specialize in the history of ideas which includes unusual non-fiction, Banned Books, philosophy, science, chess, classic literature and Theosophy with a constantly changing inventory. Care is taken to describe all books accurately. Each book is graded on its overall condition and readily noticeable defects are noted in the description. All books are carefully packaged with appropriate protection to ensure that they arrive undamaged. Visit our Website: bookendsbookstore.com

Visit Seller's Storefront

Seller's business information

BookEnds Bookstore & Curiosities

CA, U.S.A.

Terms of Sale:

All books are guaranteed to be as described. Any book is returnable with prior authorization. For orders or inquiries, please call or email us at (805) 640-9441 or info@bookendsbookstore.com. We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express and checks or money orders.

Shipping Terms:

If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to advise of additional shipping cost based on destination.
